product_name_analysis.current_assessment: The current name "Camera Indoor (USB-C) - HZ-C-2KCAM01" is overly technical and functional. It reads like a SKU rather than a consumer product. The inclusion of the model number and connector type in the primary title creates friction for non-technical homeowners.

option.reason: Focuses on the expansive field of view and the feeling of total awareness.
Emphasizes the core emotional benefit of seeing everything in the home clearly.
Highlights the 360-degree coverage and the sense of home protection.

implied_specs.spec: Dual-band Wi-Fi support for 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks ensures a stable, high-speed connection in any room.
Works seamlessly with major smart speakers and displays for instant voice-activated viewing.
Physical privacy mode and local storage options keep your most personal moments off the cloud.
Universal USB-C power input provides a modern, reliable connection that fits standard home adapters.
Compact, matte-white minimalist design intended to blend into bookshelves and nurseries discreetly.

assumptions.assumption: The device requires a constant power source via the included USB-C cable.
Local storage refers to a microSD card slot (card typically sold separately).
Remote access requires a persistent home Wi-Fi connection and the companion smartphone app.

item.title: Total Room Awareness
item.benefit: See every corner of the room without ever moving the camera yourself.
item.feature: A smooth pan-and-tilt motor provides a full 355-degree horizontal and 180-degree vertical range of motion.
item.microproof: 355° rotation covers an entire living space from a single shelf.

item.title: Lifelike Clarity
item.benefit: Identify faces and small details clearly, so you’re never left guessing what you’re seeing.
item.feature: High-resolution 2K sensors capture double the detail of standard 1080p high-definition cameras.
item.microproof: 2K resolution delivers 3 million pixels for crisp, zoomable detail.

item.title: Privacy on Your Terms
item.benefit: Enjoy total peace of mind knowing your camera only watches when you want it to.
item.feature: A dedicated Privacy Protection Mode allows you to instantly disable recording and streaming.
item.microproof: One-tap privacy shielding via the app for immediate physical peace of mind.

item.title: Intelligent Alerts
item.benefit: Stay informed about what matters, like a waking baby or a pet’s antics, without the noise.
item.feature: Advanced sensors distinguish between human movement and background noise to send relevant notifications.
item.microproof: Real-time human motion and sound detection filtered by on-device intelligence.

item.title: Natural Conversation
item.benefit: Check in and chat with family or pets as if you were standing right in the room.
item.feature: Built-in high-fidelity microphone and speaker enable seamless, two-way audio through your phone.
item.microproof: Low-latency audio for real-time, fluid communication from anywhere.

analysis.rewritten_original_prompt:
Every corner, covered. Every moment, clear.
The new OmniView 2K brings your entire home into focus. With a lens that rotates to see everything and a sensor that captures life in stunning detail, you’re always just a tap away from home.
• See the full picture. Pan and tilt to scan the room in 2K clarity, day or night. • Stay connected. Talk to the kids or quiet the dog with clear two-way audio. • Smart notifications. Get an alert the moment human motion or sound is detected. • Privacy first. Turn off the feed instantly whenever you need a private moment.
Simple to set up with a single USB-C cable and even easier to use with your favorite smart speaker. It’s not just a camera; it’s the peace of mind that comes from knowing exactly what’s happening at home.
